description:
net: fix protocol number for IPv6 test

The protocol number of ICMP for IPv6 is 58, not 1.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

Wait for r or adg.

On 2013/04/23 11:30:53, mikio wrote:
> *** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dc922c5176b5 ***
> 

This fails on my computer: http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=5344. I don't know much about all these protocols, so I have no idea what to do.

Alex

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dc922c5176b5 ***

net: fix protocol number for IPv6 test

The protocol number of ICMP for IPv6 is 58, not 1.

R=golang-dev, iant, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8663048

On Wed, Apr 24, 2013 at 4:09 PM,  <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:

> This fails on my computer:
> http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=5344. I don't know much
> about all these protocols, so I have no idea what to do.

Looks like windows builders are fine, interesting.
For now I'll send a CL that just skips that test on windows.

subject: code review 8663048: net: fix protocol number for IPv6 test
